changes: 🧩 Deals and products are now same as Ebmbook Pro POS format.
✨ Enhanced the POS App interface for smoother and more intuitive user experience.
☁️ Cloud drive sync now fully integrated with Desktop Pro POS for seamless cross-device syncing.
🧩 Products and order items were aligned with ebmbook Pro inventory for future syncing purpose.
🐞 Bug fixed with assigning category to product and opening external links.
🚀 Deals added: The deals feature enables you to create meals, create deals and link products and categories to the deals with any base price
🧠 Auto populate product groups upon typing for group names.
🔖 Deals integrated into receipts and also to cloud sync.
🧩 Added advanced product options for grouping multiple options/features under a single product.
🎛️ A product can have pre-selected group options that are automatically included, with the option to unselect or select more.
🖨️ Added multiple receipt printing features, including Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, and pre-installed system printer support.
✨ Added cloud sync option. Ebmbook Pro can sync to this Mobile POS to see live updates.
🚀 New dark theme and light theme added. The UI/UX of the app has been improved too. The menu style has been also changed.
